MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the PA18 postcode area of Wemyss Bay is still ongoing. This is due to difficulties on site and we now expect power to be back on by 5.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:22pm on Wednesday, 04 November 2020
